snippet: The Buccaneers, looking to keep their playoff hopes alive, face a Rams team that runs the ball well and always seems to make opposing teams work hard on offense.
abstract: Preview of upcoming game between Tampa Bay Buccaneers and St Louis Rams.
lead_paragraph: The Buccaneers, looking to keep their playoff hopes alive, face a Rams team that runs the ball well and always seems to make opposing teams work hard on offense.

headline.main: Tampa Bay Buccaneers (6-7) at St. Louis Rams (5-8)
